description: Automated the provisioning of a complex AWS infrastructure using Terraform. Included services like VPC, CloudFront, EC2, ALB, ElastiCache, Amazon MQ, and S3 to ensure high availability, scalability, and secure traffic management.

technologies_used.name: Terraform
technologies_used.description: Tool to automate infrastructure provisioning and management.

technologies_used.name: CloudFront
technologies_used.description: Content delivery network (CDN) for low-latency access to data.

technologies_used.name: ElastiCache
technologies_used.description: Managed Redis service for caching to enhance performance.

technologies_used.name: Amazon MQ
technologies_used.description: Managed message broker service to enable asynchronous communication.

technologies_used.name: S3
technologies_used.description: Cloud storage service for static files and backups.

infrastructure.name: VPC Setup
infrastructure.description: Created a VPC with public and private subnets, routing tables, and NAT gateways.
steps: Deployed VPC with subnets and routing tables.
Implemented NAT gateways and security groups.

infrastructure.name: CloudFront Distribution
infrastructure.description: Configured CloudFront for high-speed and secure content delivery from S3.
steps: Set up CloudFront distribution for secure content delivery.
Configured caching and SSL/TLS for encryption.

infrastructure.name: EC2 Instance Setup
infrastructure.description: Provisioned EC2 instances in private subnet with proper IAM roles and auto-scaling.
steps: Deployed EC2 instances with IAM roles and auto-scaling.
Set up security groups for communication.

infrastructure.name: Application Load Balancer (ALB)
infrastructure.description: Set up ALB to distribute traffic across EC2 instances with HTTPS.
steps: Configured ALB for secure traffic distribution.
Set up health checks and HTTPS listener.

infrastructure.name: ElastiCache Deployment
infrastructure.description: Implemented Redis through ElastiCache for better performance.

infrastructure.name: Amazon MQ Setup
infrastructure.description: Deployed Amazon MQ to facilitate message queueing between services.
steps: Configured Amazon MQ for message queueing.
Ensured proper network configuration for EC2 communication.

infrastructure.name: S3 Bucket Configuration
infrastructure.description: Set up S3 buckets for file storage and backups with security policies.
steps: Configured IAM permissions and bucket policies.

skills_required.name: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
skills_required.description: Expert in Terraform to automate the provisioning of AWS resources.

skills_required.name: Networking
skills_required.description: In-depth knowledge of VPC, subnets, routing tables, and NAT gateways.

skills_required.name: Content Delivery Networks (CDN)
skills_required.description: Configured CloudFront for secure, low-latency content delivery.

skills_required.name: Caching and Messaging Services
skills_required.description: Implemented ElastiCache for caching and Amazon MQ for message queueing.

skills_required.name: AWS Services Integration
skills_required.description: Managed multiple AWS services to ensure scalability and security.

skills_required.name: Security
skills_required.description: Implemented best practices for IAM, SSL/TLS encryption, and access control.
